page.title: 14Road Improvements
page.content: Cartgate Cross North Street, Stoke-sub-Hamdon which is normally a quiet little road becomes a death trap where it crosses the A303. This is known as Cartgate cross. A year ago a girl was KILLED on a bicycle trying to cross the main road. There have been 15 accidents in the last five years. Local residents also know of more accidents that haven't been reported to the police. An underpass or flyover is needed for a safe crossing. Another improvement wanted is to make a road along the old railway track from the A303 (known as the Cartgate roundabout) into Martock. This will stop the heavy traffic going through many narrow roads into Martock to get to the trading estate. The people in Martock want the old railway track made into a road.
